meanings: (차·배·말 등을) steer, (차를) drive, (지도·나침반 등을 이용하여) navigate
availing oneself of the gathered momentum

vlive.korean: [기세를 몰아 다음 미션 도전!] - 해! - 우리 뭐 했냐 - 고! [Going for the next game!] - Go! - What did we do? - Go! 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
vlive.english: [Going for the next game!] - Go! - What did we do? - Go!

vlive.korean: [지금의 기세몰아 남은 한 판도 이길 수 있을지?] [Then could he succeed to the end?] View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.72
vlive.english: [Then could he succeed to the end?]

vlive.korean: [기세를 몰아 두 번째 주사위까지] 이긴 사람들이... [The second dice] You are about to win. 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.68
vlive.english: [The second dice] You are about to win.

vlive.korean: 이 기세를 몰아 사쿠짱 가시죠! Next, we have Sakura! 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 오늘도 출석완료🙋‍♀️💕
두두두~ 다 여기에다가 몰아놨어요. I gathered them all here. 듣기 View video MONSTA X : [몬채널][B] EP.104 11월이 담은 순간 2018 WITH KIHYUN

examples.korean: He steered the boat into the harbour. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 보트를 몰아 항구로 들어갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He steered the boat into the harbour. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Come on Steve—let her rip. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 어서 스티브, (차를) 전속력으로 몰아 봐. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Come on Steve—let her rip. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He galloped his horse home. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 말을 전속력으로 몰아 집으로 갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He galloped his horse home. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We drove along at a terrific speed. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 엄청난 속도로 차를 몰아 달렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We drove along at a terrific speed. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She put her foot down and roared past them. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 차를 더 세게 몰아 굉음을 내며 그들을 지나갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She put her foot down and roared past them. Add to Wordbook
